metadata.Title: CVE-2020-7062 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low.
metadata.Description: In PHP versions 7.2.x below 7.2.28, 7.3.x below 7.3.15 and 7.4.x below 7.4.3, when using file upload functionality, if upload progress tracking is enabled, but session.upload_progress.cleanup is set to 0 (disabled), and the file upload fails, the upload procedure would try to clean up data that does not exist and encounter null pointer dereference, which would likely lead to a crash.

criterions.comment: php5: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
